Description: Three lengths of narrow linen tape, alternating red and undyed linen warp threads to create a pattern of bars; Warp: 12 warp ends in 8mm, three different yarns a) two outer ends on one side of the tape, S spun yellow b) alternate threads in rest of the tape, S spun red c) alternate threads in the rest of the tape, undyed and bleached?; Weft: S spun undyed linen, c.4tpc; Edges: two simple selvedges and two fragmentary
Curator's comments: Unreg. 506; Similar to EA72402 and EA37125; Found with unnumbered textiles in cupboard P; Used to secure butrial wrapping; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (7.7.1992)
